channel.title: Claude on Greg Herlein
channel.description: Recent content in Claude on Greg Herlein

item.title: From Clicking Yes to Letting Claude Run Wild (Safely)
item.description: So I’ve been working on this project called client-w-mcp â€“ it’s a leanring project to truly understand how an AI agent works with MCP servers. And I’m exploring Agentic development - with Claude Code. Why Claude Code? The first time I used it, Claude just… flowed. It seems to do a lot more by itself to figure things out. I especially like the Task() so that it can go do more than one thing at a time.

item.title: Creating Blog Posts with AI: My Experience with Zed and Claude 3.5
item.description: I’ve been exploring the intersection of AI and content creation lately, and I wanted to share my experience using Anthropic’s Claude 3.5 AI assistant within the Zed editor to streamline my blogging workflow.
